meanings.definition: The action or process of identifying the presence of something hidden or obscure.
meanings.sent1: The detection of a secret door in the old castle amazed the explorers.
meanings.sent2: The detection of a faint sound in the dark forest made the hikers uneasy.
meanings.sent3: The detection of a squirrel stealing nuts from the bird feeder was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: Her detection of sadness in his eyes was like finding a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The detection of a rainbow after the storm brought joy to everyone.

meanings.definition: The act of discovering or catching someone in the act of wrongdoing.
meanings.sent1: The detection of the thief by the security guard led to his arrest.
meanings.sent2: The detection of cheating during the exam resulted in serious consequences.
meanings.sent3: The detection of the dog stealing socks was both surprising and amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her detection of his lies felt like uncovering a hidden trap.
meanings.sent5: The detection of the culprit behind the prank brought relief to the teacher.
